RevisionEvent.Note: Changed the Access URL per James Weygand recommendation

ResourceHeader.Description:
These data consist of SDO AIA solar images at each
of nine wavelengths (94 A to 335 A at 7 wavelengths, plus one each
at 1600 and 1700 A) at 1-min resolution.  The interface lets the
user specify a display of images at any combination of the nine
available wavelengths and at any of nine time resolutions from one
image per minute to one image per day.  MEDOC is a facility hosted
at the Institut d'Astrophysique Spatiale (IAS), a mixed entity from
Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique (CNRS) and l'Universitï¿½
Paris-Sud, in  collaboration with the Centre National d'Etudes
Spatiales (CNES).
